    public final class DefaultEventStore
extends MessageStorage<io.spine.core.EventId,io.spine.core.Event>
implements EventStore, io.spine.logging.Logging
    Default implementation of EventStore.

      • appendAll

        public void appendAll(java.lang.Iterable<io.spine.core.Event> events)
        Description copied from interface: EventStore
        Appends the passed events to the history of events.

        If the passed Iterable is empty, no action is performed.

        If the passed Events belong to the different tenants, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

        Specified by:
        appendAll in interface EventStore
        Parameters:
        events - the events to append
